Class YahtzeeScorecard

java.lang.Object
yahtzee.YahtzeeScorecard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class YahtzeeScorecard extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player's scorecard in the Yahtzee game.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • recordScore

      protected void recordScore(YahtzeeCategory category, int[] dice)
      Records a score for the specified category based on the given dice values. Updates the upper or lower section totals.
      Parameters:
      category - - The YahtzeeCategory to record the score in.
      dice - - An array of integers representing the current dice values.

    • recordBonusYahtzee

      protected boolean recordBonusYahtzee(int[] dice)
      Records a bonus Yahtzee if the given dice values represent a Yahtzee and the Yahtzee category has already been scored with 50 points.
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the current dice values.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether a bonus Yahtzee was recorded.

    • isCategoryAvailable

      public boolean isCategoryAvailable(YahtzeeCategory category)
      Checks if the specified category is available for scoring.
      Parameters:
      category - - The YahtzeeCategory to check.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the category is available.

    • isUpperSectionFull

      protected boolean isUpperSectionFull()
      Checks if the upper section of the scorecard is full.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the upper section is full.

    • checkEligibilityUpperBonus

      protected void checkEligibilityUpperBonus()
      Checks if the player is eligible for the upper section bonus and applies it if they are.

    • getScores

      public HashMap<YahtzeeCategory,Integer> getScores()
      Retrieves the scores recorded in the scorecard.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing the YahtzeeCategory and corresponding scores.

    • getYahtzeeBonus

      public int getYahtzeeBonus()
      Retrieves the total Yahtzee bonus points.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the Yahtzee bonus points.

      Checks if the scorecard is complete.
